newsitem.title: USA: AMEX to list options on four companies.
newsitem.headline: AMEX to list options on four companies.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange said on Wednesday it would list options on National Media Corp on September 26.
It also said it would list options on SDL Inc and Verity Inc on September 30 and Veritas Software Corp on October 1.

The exchange said National Media options would have initial expiration months of October, November, February and May, and opening strike prices of 12-1/2, 15 and 17-1/2. The stock was down 1/4 at 14-5/8 Wednesday afternoon.
Spear, Leeds & Kellogg will be the specialist unit.
The AMEX said SDL options will open with strikes of 17-1/2, 20 and 22-1/2. Initial expiration months will be October, November, December and March.
SDL shares were down 1/4 at 19-1/2 Wednesday afternoon.
Cohen, Duffy & McGowan Inc will be the specialist.
For Verity options, opening strikes will be 10, 12-1/2 and 15 and initial expirations will be October, November, December and March.
AGS Specialist Partners will be the specialist unit.
The AMEX said Veritas options will have opening strikes of 30, 35 and 40. The stock was off 1/16 at 60. Veritas on September 3 announced a three-for-two stock split payable on September 30.
Initial expiration months for Veritas options will be October, November, February and May.
The specialist unit will be LETCO-Specialist LP.
